mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from STATUS_HISTORIES where To_CHAR(CHANGE_DATE, 'YYYYMM') = #{month} and NEXT_STATUS >=12 and NEXT_STATUS <=13
select count(*) as cnt from REQUESTS where STATUS_NO = 11

select count(*) as cnt from REQUEST_PROCESS
DEV_COMP_DATE is not null
TEST_COMP_DATE is not null
USERTEST_COMP_DATE is not null
DIST_COMP_DATE is not null

select count(*) as cnt from REQUEST_PROCESS p
, REQUESTS r
ALL_EXPECT_DATE < ALL_COMP_DATE
and r.rno=p.rno and sno=#{sno}

select count(*) as cnt from REQUEST_PROCESS
DEV_EXPECT_DATE < DEV_COMP_DATE
TEST_EXPECT_DATE < TEST_COMP_DATE
USERTEST_EXPECT_DATE < USERTEST_COMP_DATE
DIST_EXPECT_DATE < DIST_COMP_DATE

select count(*) as cnt from REQUEST_PROCESS
DEVELOPER is not null
DEV_COMP_DATE is not null
USER_TESTER is not null and TEST_COMP_DATE is not null
USERTEST_COMP_DATE is not null or (REQ_TYPE='긴급' and TEST_COMP_DATE is not null)

select count(*) as cnt from REQUEST_PROCESS
DEV_EXPECT_DATE is not null and DEV_COMP_DATE is null
TEST_EXPECT_DATE is not null and TEST_COMP_DATE is null
USERTEST_EXPECT_DATE is not null and USERTEST_COMP_DATE is null
DIST_EXPECT_DATE is not null and DIST_COMP_DATE is null
select count(*) from requests where status_no = 1
select SYSTEM_NAME as systemName, nvl(cnt,0) as sno from systems s, (select sno, count(*) as cnt from requests group by sno) c where c.sno(+)=s.sno
